It has been over four years since Otto's passing, but we must continue to honor Otto's legacy by championing human rights and holding North Korea's brutal dictatorial regime accountable for its actions. Second, it includes language from HR 6798, the Transparency for Malign Chinese Investments in Global Port Infrastructure Act , which would help shine light on Chinese investments in port infrastructure around the globe that the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) may exploit for economic and military advantages.
